title: New Mix: Quinn Christopherson, mehro, Anjimile, IDLES, more
description:
All Songs Considered host Bob Boilen shares his favorite new tracks of the week, including a new one from Tiny Desk contest winner Quinn Christopherson, the English punk group IDLES and more.

Featured Tracks:
1. IDLES: "The Beachland Ballroom," from Crawler
2. Quinn Christopherson: "Bubblegum," from I Am Bubblegum (EP)
3. Anjimile: "Stranger" (Single)
4. mehro: "howling" (Single)
5. Anna Leone: "Still I Wait," from I've Felt All These Things
6. Scout LaRue Willis: "Love Without Possession"(Single)
7. Chloe Lilac: "19" (Single)
